title: MP3/AACP (HE AAC) Shoutcast audio stream support
body: Windows 8.1 supports both these audio codecs under Shoutcast streams. Windows Phone 8.1 still doesn't.

comments.body: I created a UWP library just for this. It supports MP3 and AAC via ADTS.
Create a sdk to stream Shoutcast when creating an audio player

@jay cool library, but sadly it's aimed at Win8.1 (aka RT) apps. For Win8.0 still no luck (and the reason is only in 8.0 it's possible to use FMRadio, something the app I'm working on requires as well).
Have a look a http://www.jupitersdk.com
THIS, ABSOLUTELY THIS. I can't stand writing a humongous and complicated MSS for a thing as common and used as Shoutcast for listening to streaming audio!
